summary: TOYOTA COROLLA DIFFICULT STEERING AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS.  STEERING "STICKS" IN POSITION WHEN CORRECTING AND REQUIRES CONSTANT RE-CORRECTION.  CAR DOES NOT SELF CENTER UPON LEAVING CURVES.  WHEN CORRECTING TO THE LEFT, CAR WILL CLIMB OVER CROWN INTO ON-COMING LANE UNLESS RE-CORRECTED.  DIFFICULT TO KEEP THE CAR GOING STRAIGHT, REQUIRES CONSTANT ATTENTION AND IS FATIGUING. *TR
